body.name: WHALL® Air Fryer, 6.2QT Air Fryer Oven with LED Digital Touchscreen, 12-in-1 Cooking Functions Air fryers, Dishwasher-Safe Basket, Stainless Steel/BS
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 8 mins
features: 🍤17 Cooking Functions：8 healthy recipes: Fries, Bread, Vegetable, Steak, Drumstick, Fish, Shrimp, Thaw. 5 assist cooking functions: Air Fry, Bake, Keep Warm, Reheat,Diy.Diy the time and temperature to suit your needs. 4 control functions: Sound, Cancel, ON/OFF, Knobs: The button sound is turned off at any time (the buzzer sound is not switched off). Knob: Setting up the timer(1-60min) and the temperature(105-400℉) is a breeze! Just turn the control knobs and set to your desired temp and time.

🍟Fast Preheating & Less Oil: WHALL air fryer with fan on top of the heating element that drives air flow from the top down. The air fryer oven requires little to no preheating time and from frozen to golden brown in minutes! WHALL 6.2QT Air Fryers reduces oil or fat intake for up to 85%.

🍔Special Design: The simple and smart LED screen make the timing and temperature controlling more accurately than traditional ovens. Non-slip feet are designed to ensure safety and stability during cooking, and the square design of the frying basket has a larger footprint than the round design for more flexible cooking. In addition, the memory function allows you to remove the frying basket at any time and when you put it back, it helps you to continue the original cooking process.

🥩Easy to Clean& Safety: This air fryer made with highly durable stainless steel with a detachable basket and non-stick pan, all parts are RoHs requirements, non-stick coating-BPA-free, PFOA-free. And you can easily use the dishwasher after cooking. Built-in safety features including OVERHEAT PROTECTION and AUTOMATIC SHUT-OFF、CIRCUIT OVERLOAD PROTECTION to keep your mind at ease.

🍗Lifetime Support and Warranty: WHALL air fryer offers 12 month warranty, dedicated to provide you with an excellent and satisfying experience with the products and service, and if you have any questions about this air fryer, please contact our customer service team, we will reply you within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Is this machine easy to operate? Easy! The preset functions on the machine are very helpful. Setting up the timer (1-60 minutes) and the temperature (105-400°F) is a breeze! What is the machine made of? The machine is constructed from stainless steel, including the grill basket. This material is more durable and safer for individuals' health compared to plastic. Is the machine noisy when it runs? During and at the end of the running time, the machine will make a running sound. It is recommended to use the machine in the kitchen to minimize noise disturbance in other rooms. How is this unit preheated? When is the drip tray used? The device does not have a preheat function, but the desired preheat time and temperature can be chosen if needed. When baking items such as chicken and dried fruits, the drip tray can be used to separate liquids produced during the baking process. Is the baking effect even? It is recommended to turn fries, chicken drumsticks, and steaks, etc. during baking for optimal baking results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, fashion and useful
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love my WHALL Air Fryer! It's been a game-changer in my kitchen, and I can't recommend it enough. The 6.2-quart capacity is perfect for my family, and the LED digital touchscreen makes it incredibly easy to use. With its 12-in-1 cooking functions, I can do so much more than just air frying - I've roasted, baked, and even dehydrated with this versatile appliance. The results are consistently amazing, with food coming out crispy and delicious without the need for excessive oil. Plus, it's a breeze to clean up. This air fryer has become an essential part of my cooking routine, and I can't imagine life without it now. Five stars all the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall a GREAT oven for the family
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this air-fryer because our old air-fryer's heating element quit working. And we are all glad that it did quit on us because it allowed us to get this great and versatile Whall air-fryer oven. The oven is easy to use and has plenty of room to cook enough of what we want for a family of four. In our old air fryer you would have to cook fries/tater tots/chicken nuggets in batches to feed everyone but not with this air-fryer. It has two shelves that holds more that enough food for a family and can cook it all at once. The shelves can go right into the dishwasher (like all the accessories) for easy clean up. The only cleaning problem we have encountered is that small bits of food will get caught in the grooves that are in the bottom of the door. Still not a big deal for the time it saves us when we use the oven.We have cooked many things in this oven from air-fried chicken to air-fried fish to mac and cheese and they have all come out great. We haven't had a chance to use the rotisserie of the air-fryer so I can't really comment on that yet. But if it is anything like the ease of use we have had so far i will assume it will work just as well as the other items we have cooked.In all, this is just a great oven for the family, because of it's ease of operation, ease of cleaning, and the ease of cooking enough food quickly for a busy family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good spacious unit
reviews.reviewText: Haven't had it too long but so far has performed well and without issues. Easy to use and clean, will have to wait to see how it holds up in the long run.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars There's an Art to Cooking With It
reviews.reviewText: We have several friends who swear by the convenience and optimal cooking results of an air fryer (also known as a "convection oven"). On the other hand, some of our friends think their purchase of one was a waste of money. So, I decided to give one a try myself.The user (cook) interface of this oven is really nice. The backlit icons are very intuitive and make it easy to use the programmed cook times and temperatures. It's not super heavy and that's a good thing. We don't have a lot of countertop space in our kitchen. So, when we're not using the oven we store it on top of one of the kitchen cabinets.So far, we've cooked French fries, pork chops, and chicken wings in it. I've also baked cookies in it. My friends who love it say that it does wonders with chicken wings. For me, the first time with the chicken wings and the French fries was disappointing. The fries weren't as crispy as we were expecting. I don't think I sprayed them with enough vegetable oil. Subsequent tries turned out a little better, but fries are still a work in progress. The chicken wings didn't cook evenly. I was expecting that the circulating hot air would ensure even cooking. What I discovered is that when I use two cooking trays I still need to turn the wings periodically and swap the tray positions to help them cook evenly. Plus, I had to tweak the programmed cooking times and temp for chicken. They take a little longer to cook for me than the included cooking guide states.One thing that I wish was a little better is the depth of the bottom tray that collects the meat drippings. I wish it was deeper because it gets pretty close to overflowing most of the time. I actually have to stop the oven, take the drip tray out, dump the drippings and put the tray back in before resuming cooking. That's kind of a pain. On the other hand, the inside of the oven is easy to clean between uses.For those of you keeping score, here's the breakdown:Design- B+Construction- APracticality- BControls- B+Quality of Instructions- A-Ease of Use- BEase of Care- B+Safety- AValue- B+Overall Grade: B+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very User Friendly
reviews.reviewText: Love this air fryer. It's easy to clean and food tasted better than my old air fryer. Food is always moist on the inside and crispy on the outside. Highly recommend for those looking for an easy way to make healthy, delicious meals.
